body.name: Oxford Baby Essentials Island Mini 4-in-1 Convertible Baby Crib with Round Spindles, White
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 37 mins
features: SAFETY FIRST: Oxford Baby Nursery Furniture is made to the highest safety standards set by the CPSC and ASTM; Our furniture endures rigorous testing by 3rd party labs to guarantee compliance with U.S. and C.A. safety standards

SIMPLE YET ELEGANT STYLING: The Essentials Island Mini 4-in-1 Convertible Crib is timeless in style and carefully crafted to feature a compact, minimalistic island design, modern round spindles, and a smooth to the touch finish

PREMIUM QUALITY & CRAFTSMANSHIP: Made from solid woods and wood veneers and backed by a 1 Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty, this crib is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby

THOUGHTFULLY DESIGNED: Designed to fit the included mini crib mattress, this Oxford Baby Mini 4-in-1 Crib offers a convenient convertible design that will grow as your child grows by converting from a crib to toddler bed, daybed, and twin-size bed with 3-levels of mattress height adjustments for your growing child

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: The Oxford Baby Essentials 4-in-1 Convertible Crib has achieved GREENGUARD GOLD Certification; GREENGUARD GOLD Certified products have undergone rigorous testing for over 10,000 chemical emissions, ensuring that this product is certified for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage
body.description: The Essentials Collection by Oxford Baby combines simplicity with style in high-quality nursery furniture must-haves. With its minimalistic style agnostic design, the Essentials Collection is perfectly compatible with any nursery décor. The compact Essentials Island Mini 4-in-1 Convertible Crib is timeless in style and carefully crafted to feature a minimalistic slatted headboard and footboard, modern round spindles, and a smooth to the touch finish. Thoughtfully designed, this Essentials Island Mini 4-in-1 Crib offers a convenient convertible design that will grow as your child grows by converting from a crib to toddler bed, daybed, and twin-size bed with 3-levels of mattress height adjustments for your growing child. Plus, the mattress is included. The Essentials Collection by Oxford Baby in White features a Mini 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (12410420), 3-Drawer Dresser (12433420), Changing Topper (12463420), Changing Station (12467420), Toddler Bed Guard Rail (12496420), and Twin-Size Bed Conversion Kit (12487420), sold separately. The Essentials Collection is available in fashionable Gray and White finishes. This mini Oxford Baby Crib arrives ready to assemble and includes hardware for assembly. The crib measures 40.63 in. W x 26.13 in. D x 34 in. H (31.02 lbs.) and can accommodate up to 35 pounds when used as a crib, toddler bed, or day bed and 300 pounds when converted to a twin-size bed. Made from solid woods and wood veneers, this crib is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby. Plus, this crib is backed by a 1 Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty. The Oxford Baby Essentials Island Mini 4-in-1 Convertible Crib has achieved GREENGUARD GOLD Certification. GREENGUARD GOLD Certified products are certified to GREENGUARD GOLD standards for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Greenguard Gold Certified Tested for over 10,000 chemicals and VOC's, ensuring that your little one is sleeping in a safe and healthy environment. 3 Adjustable Height Settings Thoughtfully designed to lower as your baby crawls, sits, and stands. The mattress support will lower to accommodate your child's growing needs. Superior Construction Oxford Baby cribs are made from the finest materials for durability, and sourced from sustainable forests.

Essential Mini Crib The Essential 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib grows with your child over time for long-lasting value. Essential Toddler Bed The Essential 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib adapts into a toddler bed; this stage teaches your child to get in and out of bed on their own. Toddler Guard Rail sold separately. Essential Day Bed For added versatility, the Essential 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib converts into a day bed. Essential Twin Bed The Essential 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib converts into a twin size bed for your little one. Twin Bed Conversion Kit sold separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a great buy!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Assembling was pretty straight forward you definitely need two people to install the metal box spring part because it’s a super snug fit. But it’s a nice crib and the perfect size. The mattress isn’t anything fancy but it does the job. For the price it’s a great purchase.
